content:
We wanted to inform you that our mobile development team has implemented the feature of displaying a response message from the backend when validating coupons. This will allow users to receive feedback on whether their coupon code is valid or not. We apologize for any confusion or inconvenience caused by this issue and are glad to have it resolved.
Please let us know if there are any other issues or concerns you have and we will do our best to address them. We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to deliver a fully functional product that meets your requirements.
